keywords: Bolognese,Low salt,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Beef,Mushroom,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Mince,Dinner Made Easy,Peanut free
name: Simple spaghetti bolognese Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat olive oil in a large frying pan on medium heat. Add mushrooms and cook, stirring occasionally, for 5 minutes or until browned.
Add beef and cook for 5 minutes or until cooked through. Season with salt and pepper. Add sauce and stir to combine.
Meanwhile, cook pasta in a large saucepan of salted boiling water according to packet instructions.
Stir sauce through the pasta and serve.
